These two new models have been on the market since August with $390 and $440 full prices, but we didn’t see the first discounts taking the prices lower until late October, with these two rates first offered last month in early Black Friday sales. Now, you’re getting a second chance at these all-time low prices, saving you $90 off both going rates.
